text:
Charlotte, NC - FULLTIME, INTERN We’re building mobile payment solutions for parking. No more coins! We’re a small team growing fast and ready to bring on a more developers to push things faster. We've found the best way to form a relationship is through our programming challenge. Just show us your skills. (dont care to much for resumes!) http://passportparking.info/PassportProgrammingTest/ Feel free to reach out if you have questions! If you need motivation to complete the challenge email me.

Cheers, Brad brad@passportparking.com
